name: Condom dispenser
description: Unlocks the condom dispenser. Boosts the effect of giving condoms at higher levels. Automates the distribution at max level.
detailedDescription: Gives the possibility to distribute condoms to the customers.
Improves the effect of the happiness boost from condoms by 5.

Automatically give condoms to clients who wants them.
